## LaTeX environment


```{r}
with_latex({
  begin("center", {
    c("This is a paragraph of text")
  }) %n%
  C("this is commented") %l%
    "newline" %n%
    M("1" %/% "2") %n%
    m(.("alpha") %/% .("gamma") %^% 2)
}) %>% cat
```
